text:
[Verse]
Morning sun rise up so bright
Coffee cup feels just right
Sipping slow feel the glow
Start the day nice and slow

[Verse 2]
Buzzing streets people meet
Music in my heart's beat
Smiling faces race to go
All around life's a show

[Chorus]
Coffee fresh starts anew
Simple joys me and you
Catch the light feel the breeze
Life's a song play with ease

[Verse 3]
Sky so blue dreams come true
Every note feels brand new
Dancing feet on the run
Morning light has just begun

[Bridge]
Feel the warmth of the day
In our hearts it will stay
Clear your mind breathe it in
That's how every day should begin

[Chorus]
Coffee fresh starts anew
Simple joys me and you
Catch the light feel the breeze
Life's a song play with ease
title: Morning Coffee
